item.title: Tailscale
item.description:
Last Friday I got to know Tailscale by a complete coincidence. Someone I follow on twitter mentioned it:

What can I say: it blew my mind! I always wanted to setup a VPN connection between my droplet and my NAS at home for backups. But of course I was way too lazy to configure OpenVPN or something similar. I knew about WireGuard and the progress they were making, but had been too lazy to set this up myself. And so along comes Tailscale, a fully integrated WireGuard setup and almost a one click installation.
